document.full_text: a tornado on friday forced the closing of the city's gateway, but, bruised and smelling strongly of plywood, the transportation hub reopened for much of its traffic on sunday.
document.title: struggling st. louis airport takes a shot to the chin, but recovers
lines_and_colors: a tornado on friday forced the closing of the city's gateway, but, bruised and smelling strongly of plywood, the transportation hub reopened for much of its traffic on sunday.
